== Description ==
Convert entities, while preserving already-encoded entities. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php htmlentities2( $myHTML ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$myHTML|string|The text to be converted.}}

== Return Values ==
; (string) : Converted text.
